name: tailwind-autofix-canonical-classnames
description: Auto-fix Tailwind CSS canonical class suggestions on save, as suggested by https://github.com/tailwindlabs/tailwindcss/discussions/19323.

scripts.publish:ovsx: pnpm version patch --no-git-tag-version && pnpm dlx ovsx publish -p "$OPEN_VSX_TOKEN" --skip-duplicate

tailwindCanonicalClasses.fixOnSave.description: Apply canonical Tailwind class fixes on save.
